tossup_question: 8) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following is the BEST example of a suspension:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) water with 10% ethanol added to it 
X) olive oil in water 
Y) table sugar completely dissolved in water
 Z) orange juice with pulp
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Z) ORANGE JUICE WITH PULP
bonus_question: 8) CHEMISTRY  According to thermodynamics, whenever energy is converted from one form to another then:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) the net useful energy remains the same 
X) the net useful energy must decrease 
Y) the total energy of the system increases 
Z) the total energy of the system decreases
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) THE NET USEFUL ENERGY MUST DECREASE
